item.title: DreamRunner: Fine-Grained Storytelling Video Generation with Retrieval-Augmented Motion Adaptation
item.description: DREAMRUNNER generates high-quality storytelling videos by using LLMs for hierarchical planning, motion retrieval, and a novel spatial-temporal region-based diffusion model for fine-grained control.
